description: Renames an existing column in a datatable.

input.name: data
input.description: A datatable which contains columns to be renamed.

input.name: mapping
input.description: A mapping of old column names to new ones.

input.name: discard
input.description: Specifies whether to discard columns which are not included in `mapping`. Defaults to `true`.

output.name: data
output.description: A new datatable with the columns renamed.
